thread.title: Nokia 105 Dual SIM Now Available in India for $21
thread.title_full: Nokia 105 Dual SIM Now Available in India for $21 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Nokia 105 Dual SIM Now Available in India for $21
text: Back in June, Microsoft unveiled the Nokia 105 and Nokia 105 Dual SIM as the company’s most affordable phones ever. Don’t kid yourselves, the Nokia 105 duo is not similar to most smartphones launching on the market today, and Redmond says they are the best choice for those buying a personal phone for the first time or looking for a device to last them during long trips. Well, today Microsoft is making the Nokia 105 Dual SIM available in India, where customers can pick i... »
